document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Lathkule Villa on Hassantyr's Street.
document_data.name: Lathkule Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Lathkule Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Lathkule]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the central section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] on the southwest side of the intersection of [[Whaelgond Way]] with [[Hassantyr's Street]]. The south side of the villa lay along the [[Street of the Manticore]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: Four buildings faced each other surrounding a garden within the walled compound. The buildings were three storys tall.
